solution_line_template: 10% of {total_jelly_beans} jelly beans is ({thomas_percentage_numerator}/{thomas_percentage_denominator})*{total_jelly_beans} = <<{total_jelly_beans}*{thomas_percentage_numerator}/{thomas_percentage_denominator}={thomas_jelly_beans}>>{thomas_jelly_beans} jelly beans

Thomas takes {thomas_jelly_beans} jelly beans leaving {total_jelly_beans}-{thomas_jelly_beans} = <<{total_jelly_beans}-{thomas_jelly_beans}={remaining_jelly_beans}>>{remaining_jelly_beans} jelly beans

{remaining_jelly_beans} jelly beans are to be shared in the ratio {barry_ratio_part}:{emmanuel_ratio_part} so each share is {remaining_jelly_beans}/({barry_ratio_part}+{emmanuel_ratio_part}) = <<{remaining_jelly_beans}/({barry_ratio_part}+{emmanuel_ratio_part})={jelly_beans_per_share}>>{jelly_beans_per_share} jelly beans
